attributes.action: Amend the Care Act 2014 statutory guidance so as to make human rights first.
attributes.additional_details: Our full petition can be found at: https://www.change.org/p/uk-health-secretary-house-of-commons-amend-the-care-act-2014-statutory-guidance-so-as-to-make-human-rights-first
attributes.background: Despite the Mcdonald Judgment of the ECHR which now requires states to take into account notions of quality of life and dignity, we believe that economic considerations and best value still too often prevail over human rights in too many places, which is a.) inconsistent, b.) untenable for people.
